mapper.select:
select count(g.id) from t_mall_auction g where g.is_delete = 0
and g.auc_start_time > now() and g.auc_end_time > now()
and g.auc_start_time <= now() and now() < g.auc_end_time
and g.auc_start_time < now() and g.auc_end_time <= now()
and
g.shop_id = #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from t_mall_auction g left join t_mall_store s on g.shop_id = s.id left join t_mall_product p on p.id= g.product_id and p.is_delete=0 where g.is_delete = 0
and g.auc_start_time > now() and g.auc_end_time > now()
and g.auc_start_time <= now() and now() < g.auc_end_time
and g.auc_start_time < now() and g.auc_end_time <= now()
and
g.shop_id = #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
group by g.id order by g.create_time desc limit #{firstNum},#{maxNum}

SELECT count(distinct(a.id)) from t_mall_product a WHERE a.is_publish=1 AND a.check_status=1 AND a.is_delete=0
AND a.shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND a.pro_name like '%${proName}%'
AND a.id in (select product_id from t_mall_product_group where group_id = #{groupId})

select b.id, b.product_id as productId, b.auc_start_price as aucStartPrice,b.auc_lowest_price as aucLowestPrice, b.auc_start_time as aucStartTime, b.auc_end_time as aucEndTime, b.auc_lower_price_time as aucLowerPriceTime,b.auc_lower_price as aucLowerPrice, b.auc_restriction_num as aucRestrictionNum,b.auc_num as aucNum,b.auc_type as aucType, b.shop_id as shopId, c.image_url as imageUrl,e.specifica_img_url as specImageUrl,p.is_specifica as isSpecifica,p.pro_name as proName ,if(p.is_specifica = 0 ,p.pro_price,d.inv_price) as proPrice, b.is_margin as isMargin, b.auc_margin as aucMargin, b.auc_add_price as aucAddPrice from t_mall_auction b left join t_mall_product p on b.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT ass_id,image_url from t_mall_image_associative WHERE ass_type=1 AND is_delete=0 AND is_main_images=1) c ON b.product_id=c.ass_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_id,specifica_img_id,inv_num,inv_price,id FROM t_mall_product_inventory where is_default=1 AND is_delete=0)d ON b.product_id=d.product_id LEFT JOIN t_mall_product_specifica e ON d.specifica_img_id=e.id where b.id =#{id}

SELECT
from t_mall_auction g left join t_mall_store s on g.shop_id = s.id left join t_mall_product p on p.id= g.product_id and p.is_delete=0 WHERE g.is_delete = 0 and g.is_use =1 and g.id = #{id} group by g.id
